blockquote.p: 'draw-mhmm' converts a given Meta-MEME hidden Markov model into a format suitable for input to the graphviz program from AT&T Research.

ul.li: <HMM file> - An HMM in Meta-MEME format (as produced by mhmm) must be provided. If the filename is given as '-', then 'mhmms' will attempt to read the HMM from standard input.

blockquote.p: The program writes to standard output a description of the HMM in graphviz format.

ul.li: --mintrans <value> - Only include in the graph edges whose transition probabilities exceed the given value.
--consensus - Print consensus along with motif id.
--verbosity 1|2|3|4|5 - Set the verbosity level of the output to stderr. The default level is 2.
